titles.title: Proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States to require that the Supreme Court be composed of not more than nine justices.
Proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States to require that the Supreme Court be composed of not more than nine justices.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary: This joint resolution proposes an amendment to the Constitution requiring the Supreme Court to be composed of not more than nine Justices.
